alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:23AM CST until January 31 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CST Saturday was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 15.4 feet this evening. It will then fall tomorrow morning. It will rise to 15.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CST.
